text: @realDonaldTrump And right now you are denying coronavirus.  Haven't heard a word about it from you for quite sometime.  Haven't heard anything about a vaccine.  Meanwhile, it is rearing its ugly head once again because you encouraged everyone to open up.  Many more than the 113,000 Americans...
